title: What is the correct way of holding the tashahhud finger? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: what is the correct way to hold the tisha hood finger in the demonstration we gave it is as follows either you make a fist with your two fingers the pinky and the one next to it and then make a circle with the middle finger and the thumb and you point the index finger and you move it shake it in its place or you make a fist with all your four fingers and point with the index finger and you will see this in the demo insha'Allah
